t=int(raw_input())
for x in range(t):
    (a,b)=raw_input().split()
    ra=""
    rb=""
    for i in xrange(len(a)-1,-1,-1):
        ra=ra+a[i]
    for i in xrange(len(b)-1,-1,-1):
        rb=rb+b[i]
    rsum=int(ra)+int(rb)
    rst=str(rsum)
    s=""
    for i in xrange(len(rst)-1,-1,-1):
        s=s+rst[i]
    print int(s)
